title: Holy crap has anyone tried 5.22 Lucian yet?
body: Weedwick 2.0, grab Fervor of Battle, build Reaver, Triforce, Greaves, youmuu's, Infinity Edge, Bloodthirster and go wild.

replies.body: Tried this out and got penta kill the second game lol :D in ranked p2
I really like the buff. Since I play AP Lucy my ult feels really powerful as it shots a lot faster than before
his ult isnt buffed by the youmuus active so you might aswell get something better, not that i would know cos i cant remember any of the item changes
I dont get youmuu's for the active, I get it for the 65 AD and the massive armour penetration. The cooldown reduction and active are just icing on the cake.
Yeah the Youmuu buffs are really strong. Definitely a grab for any AD damage dealing champ now.

SHHHHHHHHHHH!

YOU'LL MAKE RIOT NERF THE ONLY ADC I CAN PLAY...

Nah everyone is rightfully bitching about Graves right now.
Tell me have you gone up against a Graves with that build and won?
Looking for a decent counter

Yeah Graves is rediculous. I was J4, he was running away from a teamfight gone bad with about 100hp. I was mostly tank execpt a BC. Waiting for flag to come off of CD and win. He finishes reloading, turns and kills me with one shot from about 1/4 hp with my shield up. It was so bs.
AD Champions are living THE life with items now I h8 it so much
